Hey, we hope you are keeping well!
Weâve just launched a brand-new menu and would love for you to come and try it out over the Easter break.

You can expect the most delicious artisan pizzas and handcrafted pastas, teamed with some incredible starters and sides too.
You are welcome to come along anytime 7-9th April, or 14-16th April.

Of course, you are welcome to bring along a +1 too.

Hey! We hope you are doing well.

The La Piccola team wanted to invite you along to our exclusive opening evening next month.

Our much-anticipated launch is just around the corner, and we wanted to invite you to our sneak-preview event before we officially open our doors.

This event will be held on the 13th December 5-9pm, and we would love it if you and a +1 could make it along? You can come by anytime that evening, so donât worry if you canât make it for 5.

You will get to try some of our delicious food and see the place before anyone else does.

Youâll be able to find us at 55 Main St, Bothwell, Glasgow G71 8ER.

Each guest will receive a main course, side, and a drink. All we ask is that you post some content on your page letting everyone know about our delicious offerings coming to Bothwell in December.

Please note: we primarily offer takeaway, but do have a small seating area too. We expect this evening to be busy so please be aware of longer waits during peak times.

If you could reply on here with your RSVP, that would be great. We hope to see you there!
